item.title: Now
item.description: What Iâ€™m doing now Work: I look at Machine Learning and Natural Language stuff for Verloop. We help make customer support more humane. Career: Rather scattered and still exploratory Torschlusspaniki About the word Torschlusspaniki My previous workplaces made a serious dent in the size of my dreams. Psychological safety is a weird concept. I wish more leaders understood this intuitively. Last Updated in October 2019 from Bengaluru, India The concept of now page is from Derek Sivers

Hiya! I’m Nirant! It means the calm of the forest in Gujarati, Sanskrit and Prakrit. The last two are languages, all but lost to time. 3 things I want you to know about me: Make $$ doing NLP. Even wrote a book about NLP. I talk a lot about it too I write blogs about career, technology and business: Newsletter I’m always happy to help those who ask crisp and descriptive questions.
